feedback:
-The plan does not specify how the 'date of joining' field will be made optional for existing records but required for new registrations, as per the validation rules.
 -Step 3 mentions a database migration script but does not provide details on how existing records will be handled to ensure backward compatibility.
 -The plan does not address how the 'date of joining' field will be validated for existing records that may not have this field.
 -There is no mention of how the frontend will handle error messages for invalid or missing 'date of joining' inputs.
 -The plan does not specify how the 'date of joining' field will be integrated into the existing user interface without disrupting current functionality.
 -Step 2 should include details on how the backend will handle error responses for invalid 'date of joining' inputs.
 -The plan does not mention any specific Material Design component that will be used for the date picker, which could affect implementation feasibility.
